* Iron Raptor felt a slight reliefe as the armor metled and covered the 
wound in Dinobots lung, sealing it as a slight patch-up job.
She removed the welding gun a shut it off, watching as the armor slowly 
began to harden and solidify.
Her optics caught Prowl as he ran into the room, carrying and energon she 
had asked for.
She grabbed the bage and snapped her head towards a hook up on an IV pole.
Iron Raptor swiftly went ofer to it and hooked up the bag to the pole, 
grabbing one of the tubes Prowl had brought her before and hooking it up to 
the bottom of the beg. She tapped the tube for a sec to make sure that it 
would work, then walked over to Dinobot.
She sighed and looked over to Prowl.*

" Open his mouth..."

* This tube she held would go down his throat and into his stomach, pumping 
fluids into his body to be digested and transformed into mech-fluid.
But she needed both her hands to shove this tube down his throat, and she 
just prayed that he didn't wake up and start gaging on it.*
